00003 #include <cmath>
00004 #include "RmLocalMap.h"

00006 
00007 const std::string RmLocalMap::update( const RmUtility::SonarReading& reading )
00008 {
00009         RmUtility::Pose origin( m_globalOrigin.coord, m_settings->PreRotate ? m_globalOrigin.theta : 0.0 );
00010         return update( reading, origin, true );
00011 }
00012 
00013 
00014 const std::string RmLocalMap::update( 
00015         const RmUtility::SonarReading& reading, const RmUtility::Pose& pivot, bool saveHistory )
00016 {
00017         // Save sonar reading
00018         if ( saveHistory ) m_sonarReadings.push_back( reading );
00019 
00020         // Get the localized robot, sonar, and object pose data (only for first sonar of a sweep)
00021         static RmUtility::Pose lastPose_;
00022         static RmUtility::Pose localPose_;
00023         if ( lastPose_ != reading.robotPose ) 
00024         {
00025                 // If the pose of the first reading is (0,0):0 (such as when the robot starts up),
00026                 // this won't execute, but a rotation wouldn't have any effect anyway, so it's no prob
00027 
00028                 // Update cumulative distance traveled and degrees turned
00029                 // (accounting for transition across due north)
00030                 m_cumDist += reading.robotPose.coord.distanceFrom( lastPose_.coord );
00031                 double t = abs( reading.robotPose.theta - lastPose_.theta );
00032                 if ( t > 180 ) t = abs( t - 360 );
00033                 m_cumTurn += t;
00034 
00035                 localPose_ = lastPose_ = reading.robotPose;
00036                 if ( pivot.theta != 0 ) 
00037                 {
00038                         // If there were no concern for efficiency, everything in this block could be
00039                         // removed but these two commands, which is where the real work gets done:
00040                         localPose_.coord.rotateBy( pivot.theta, pivot.coord );
00041                         localPose_.theta += pivot.theta;
00042                 }
00043         }
00044 
00045         // Get map of sonar reading
00046         // Viewer is expecting blank line as token separating output between calls to update()
00047         std::string map = RmBayesCertaintyGrid::update( 
00048                 RmUtility::SonarReading( localPose_, &reading.all[0], reading.sonarNumber ) );
00049         if ( map.length() > 0 ) map.append( "\n" );
00050 
00051         return map;
00052 }
00053 
00054 
00055 const std::string RmLocalMap::reorientedBy( const RmUtility::Pose& shift ) const
00056 {
00057         // Start with a clean slate
00058         RmBayesCertaintyGrid grid( m_settings );
00059 
00060         // Shift all robot poses from global origin and recalculate sonar poses and probabilities
00061         std::string logString;
00062         for ( std::vector<RmUtility::SonarReading>::const_iterator reading = m_sonarReadings.begin(); 
00063                 reading != m_sonarReadings.end(); ++reading )
00064         {
00065                 RmUtility::SonarReading r = *reading;
00066                 r.robotPose += shift;
00067                 r.robotPose.coord.rotateBy( shift.theta, m_globalOrigin.coord + shift.coord );
00068 
00069                 std::string map = grid.update( r );
00070                 if ( map.length() > 0 ) {
00071                         logString.append( map + "\n" );
00072                 }
00073         }
00074 
00075         return logString;
00076 }
00077 
00078 
00079 const std::string RmLocalMap::reorientBy( const RmUtility::Pose& shift )
00080 {
00081         // Wipe the slate clean
00082         empty();
00083 
00084         // Shift the global origin
00085         m_globalOrigin += shift;
00086 
00087         // Shift all the robot poses and recalculate sonar poses and probabilities
00088         std::string logString;
00089         for ( std::vector<RmUtility::SonarReading>::iterator reading = m_sonarReadings.begin(); 
00090                 reading != m_sonarReadings.end(); ++reading )
00091         {
00092                 (*reading).robotPose += shift;
00093                 (*reading).robotPose.coord.rotateBy( shift.theta, m_globalOrigin.coord );
00094 
00095                 std::string map = RmBayesCertaintyGrid::update( *reading );
00096                 if ( map.length() > 0 ) {
00097                         logString.append( map + "\n" );
00098                 }
00099         }
00100 
00101         return logString;
00102 }
